Package controller

Class PodCastPlayerController

java.lang.Object
controller.PodCastPlayerController
public class PodCastPlayerController
extends java.lang.Object
This Class functions as the controller for the podcast Player Application. It's primary function is to create and interact with the MediaPlayer Object. This class retrieves Podcast objects from the podcast model Class.
Author:
Sara Grimes, Sean O'Meara, Garrett Scott, Todd Noecker

    Constructors

    Instantiates a model for this class to interact with.

    Get the MediaPlayer with the current podcast loaded into it.
    java.util.List<PodcastPlayerModel.Podcast> getPodcasts()
    Returns a sorted list of all Podcasts currently stored in the model.

    This method will pause the currently playing podcast episode.

    This method will rewind the current podcast episode.

    This method will start a podcast episode playing.

  • Method Details

    • getMediaPlayer

      public javafx.scene.media.MediaPlayer getMediaPlayer()
      Get the MediaPlayer with the current podcast loaded into it.
      Returns:
      MediaPlayer object with a podcast in it.

    • changeEp

      public void changeEp​(java.lang.String podcastName, java.lang.String epTitle)
      This Changes the current episode being played. It will first check if there is a current episode loaded. If there is, it will save its play time for future reference then get the new episode from the model.
      Parameters:
      podcastName - string name of the podcast
      epTitle - string name of the podcast episode

    • startPlayPodcast

      public void startPlayPodcast()
      This method will start a podcast episode playing.

    • pausePodcast

      public void pausePodcast()
      This method will pause the currently playing podcast episode.

    • fastForwardPodcast

      public void fastForwardPodcast()
      This method will fast forward the current podcast episode.

    • rewindPodcast

      public void rewindPodcast()
      This method will rewind the current podcast episode.

    • getPodcasts

      public java.util.List<PodcastPlayerModel.Podcast> getPodcasts()
      Returns a sorted list of all Podcasts currently stored in the model.
      Returns:
      the current list of Podcasts.
